attributes.action: Force energy suppliers to reduce prices for consumers in line with the oil price
attributes.additional_details: Much documented utility rises linked to oil and gas prices yet reductions are less than expectations.
attributes.background: When utility fuel prices go up so does the consumer costs but when they come down there is a huge disparity between the costs. Especially with the low oil and gas prices there should be a far greater fall in consumer prices and kept in line the rises and falls in real terms.
